page.title: 01Summary.
page.content: The survey area is predominantly rural, the relatively small urban areas being mainly residential. There are four housing estates, each well served with amenities, catering for some of the residential needs of Stafford's workforce whilst some of the housing is for commuters who work in the West Midlands. The river Penk flows North-South through the area, the river valley accommodating communication links including the M6 motorway, A449 trunk road, the Stafford to London railway line and the Staffordshire & Worcestershire Canal. The flood plain of the Penk is quite marshy and flooding is common,restricting agricultural use. Farming within the area is centred around the villages of Acton Trussell and Bednall.
